text: Cláudia Maria Patitucci Jimenez (18 November 1958 – 20 August 2022) was a Brazilian actress, comedian and screenwriter. She was known for her roles in Os Trapalhões, Viva O Gordo and Chico Anysio Show. Her 1990 movie role in O Corpo was also well known. Jimenez was born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Jimenez died on 20 August 2022 in Rio de Janeiro from heart failure caused by lung cancer at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Brazilian screenwriters Category:Brazilian comedians Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Actors from Rio de Janeiro
title: Cláudia Jimenez
